
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is typed-array-like.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is typed-array-like.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new Int16Array() )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}({
    >    'length': 10,
    >    'byteOffset': 0,
    >    'byteLength': 10,
    >    'BYTES_PER_ELEMENT': 4
    > })
    true

    See Also
    --------
